doc.name: PthalesCompositeActor
doc.description: A composite actor imposes the use of PthalesIOPort as they contain needed values used by PThalesDirector. A PthalesCompositeActor can contain actors from different model (as SDF), but the port must be a PthalesIOPort, because of the ArrayOL parameters.
doc.author: Rémi Barrère
doc.property: The number of times this actor is fired. The initial default value is an array with one element, the integer "1".
